title: Executive Assistant & Operations Support Specialist
job_overview:
KINDLY READ THE JOB DESCRIPTION BEFORE APPLYING. 

Position Overview:
 We are seeking a highly organized, detail-oriented, and culturally-aware Executive Assistant & Operations Support Specialist to provide high-level administrative and operational support to a small business founder and her team. This role involves a broad scope of responsibilities, including executive assistance, bookkeeping, human resources administration, customer service coordination, and CRM reporting.
The ideal candidate will possess strong communication skills in English (spoken and written), a proactive work ethic, cultural empathy, and the ability to manage multiple responsibilities while maintaining discretion and professionalism.

Key Responsibilities:
Executive Assistance
- Attend internal meetings, take detailed notes, and follow up on action items.
- Assist in managing the founder’s schedule and email communications.
- Support with team accountability by tracking deliverables and deadlines.


Customer Service & CRM Oversight
- Monitor incoming emails for order accuracy; flag and correct discrepancies.
- Assist with customer payment follow-ups and ensure clarity in communications.
- Generate CRM reports, track sales data, and manage follow-ups with the sales team.
- Provide backup support for answering phones when needed.


Human Resources & Administrative Support
- Prepare and maintain new hire paperwork and HR documentation.
- Track PTO, employee reviews, birthdays, and milestone celebrations.
- Ensure timely acknowledgment of employee birthdays and events.
- Assist with onboarding tasks and maintain employee records.


Bookkeeping & Financial Coordination
- Manage journal entries, credit card reconciliation, and checkbook balancing.
- Support weekly creation of the CEO’s dashboard report.
- Assist with payroll submissions and related documentation.


Required Qualifications:
- At least 3 years of relevant experience in executive support, bookkeeping, HR, or operations.
- Proficient in QuickBooks, Google Workspace, Microsoft Office, and common CRM platforms.
- Excellent English communication skills—both verbal and written.
- Strong attention to detail, organizational skills, and accountability.
- Comfortable navigating cultural differences with professionalism and empathy.
- Ability to work independently with minimal supervision.

Preferred Qualifications:
- Experience working with U.S.-based clients or companies.
- Prior HR or payroll administration experience.
- Familiarity with remote communication tools (Zoom, Slack, etc.).
- Experience managing internal team celebrations and employee engagement initiatives.
